helio.materialiser.cache

Class RDF4JMemoryCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • helio.materialiser.cache.RDF4JMemoryCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MaterialiserCache

    public class RDF4JMemoryCache
extends java.lang.Object
implements MaterialiserCache
    This class implements a MaterialiserCache relying on the RDF4J repositories.

    Using the configuration method of this class the inner repository of the RDF4JMemoryCache can be instantiated using different implementations.

    Author:
    Andrea Cimmino

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      RDF4JMemoryCache()
      This method initializes the inner repository with a MemoryStore repository
      RDF4JMemoryCache(java.io.File directory)
      This method initializes the inner repository with a MemoryStore repository that persists the data in the provided file directory
